sentence.Network_en: She was paring her nails with nailscissors.
sentence.Network_cn: 她正在用指甲刀修指甲.

sentence.Network_en: She could peel an apple with a single long paring.
sentence.Network_cn: 她可以将苹果皮削成长长的一条.

sentence.Network_en: He is sitting in the sofa. paring his nails down.
sentence.Network_cn: 他坐在沙发上修剪指甲.

entry.tran: 削下的皮；（指甲、水果、蔬菜等的）削去物
entry.def: Parings are thin pieces that have been cut off things such as a fingernails, fruit, or vegetables.

means.word_mean: 1. a thin fragment or slice (especially of wood) that has been shaved from something
2. (usually plural) a part of a fruit or vegetable that is pared or cut off; especially the skin or peel;

sentences.sentence: "she could peel an apple with a single long paring"

auth_sentence.content: It envisions cutting Pentagon weapons programs and paring back almost all domestic programs.
